ModMetaData.name: LMC035.定时开关
ModMetaData.author: Shaun McFall
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html Adds power switches that can be activated or deactivated according to the current in-game time. 添加可根据当前游戏内时间激活或停用的电源开关。 *Power switches must be researched before they are unlocked. 必须先研究电源开关才能建造它。 汉化：jxb12306 合集地址：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html
